channel.title: Anyone know anything about modeling?
channel.description:
well since i descoverd private servers i decided to make my own game, i got 4 modeling programs and found 3ds max 9 to be my favorite.
problem is i have no idea what im doing, i want to learn how to use nurbs and how to use patchgrids.
im looking to make modles like the ones attached to this thread.
anyone wanna help

item.title: Anyone know anything about modeling?
item.dc:creator: @Got_Shine Got_Shine
item.description:
@Got_Shine wrote:

If you’re still looking for tutorials for 3d Studio Max go here http://www.pixel2life.com/tutorials/3d_studio_max/

However if you have no idea what you’re doing you should prolly listen to what jme said and use wings3d

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone know anything about modeling?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Don’t use nerbs for models in a game. Use polygons.

If your a begginer, the best program for a complete noob is wings3d, I forget the site so google it.

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone know anything about modeling?
item.dc:creator: @THeNiNJa THeNiNJa
item.description:
@THeNiNJa wrote:

So do that mean that there is 40 (example) pictures of an object. Up, down, left, right… and other faces?

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone know anything about modeling?
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

That model is from tactics arena, right?

In this case I think that is a sprite, not a model. The game uses images of a model in certain poses used together to make it appear as if it is rendering a 3D model on the fly but it is actually only premade stills playing together.

Anyway, this thread belongs in the graphics section, good luck getting some help :).

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone know anything about modeling?
item.dc:creator: @THeNiNJa THeNiNJa
item.description:
@THeNiNJa wrote:

I am using milkshape 3d to make models to counter-strike.
I was wondering if could add my own models to Testscape.
I’ve never tried 3ds max so i can’t tell you what to do.
I could try it if you gave me a link for a demo.

Read full topic
